sentences.sContent: I assented to the request of the American publishers to write this book.
sentences.sCn: 我同意了美国出版商们写这本书的请求。

remMethod.val: as(表加强) + sent(感觉) → 强烈地感觉相同 → 同意

trans.tranOther: to agree to a suggestion, idea etc after considering it carefully

trans.tranCn: 赞同； 财产转让证书
trans.tranOther: approval or agreement from someone who has authority
